verses.verse: <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and <S%H7200>saw<s%> there a <S%H802>prostitute,<s%> and went in to <S%H935>her.<s%>

The <S%H5841>Gazites<s%> were <S%H559>told,<s%> <S%H8123>"Samson<s%> is <S%H935>here!<s%>" They surrounded <S%H693>him,<s%> and laid wait for him all <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5437>in<s%> the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and were <S%H2790>quiet<s%> all the <S%H3915>night,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Wait until <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light,<s%> then we will kill <S%H2026>him.<s%>"

<S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7901>lay<s%> until <S%H2677>midnight,<s%> and <S%H6965>arose<s%> at <S%H2677>midnight,<s%> and laid <S%H270>hold<s%> of the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H5892>city,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4201>posts,<s%> and plucked them <S%H1280>up,<s%> bar and <S%H7760>all,<s%> and put them on his <S%H3802>shoulders,<s%> and <S%H5265>carried<s%> them <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron.<s%>
It came to pass <S%H310>afterward,<s%> that he <S%H157>loved<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> in the <S%H5158>valley<s%> of <S%H7796>Sorek,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H1807>Delilah.<s%>

The <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H559>her,<s%> and said to <S%H6601>her,<s%> "Entice <S%H7200>him,<s%> and see in which his <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H3201>lies,<s%> and by what means we may prevail against <S%H631>him,<s%> that we may bind him to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H376>him;<s%> and we will each <S%H5414>give<s%> you eleven <S%H505>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>"

<S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> "Please <S%H5046>tell<s%> me where your <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> <S%H631>lies,<s%> and what you might be bound to afflict <S%H6031>you.<s%>"

<S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H631>her,<s%> "If they bind me with <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3499>cords<s%> that were never <S%H2717>dried,<s%> then shall I become <S%H2470>weak,<s%> and be as <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H120>man.<s%>"

Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> brought <S%H5927>up<s%> to her <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3892>green<s%> <S%H3499>cords<s%> which had not been <S%H2717>dried,<s%> and she bound him with <S%H631>them.<s%>

Now she had an <S%H693>ambush<s%> <S%H3427>waiting<s%> in the inner <S%H2315>room.<s%> She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6430>him,<s%> "The Philistines are on <S%H8123>you,<s%> Samson!" He <S%H5423>broke<s%> the <S%H3499>cords,<s%> as a <S%H6616>string<s%> of <S%H5296>tow<s%> is <S%H5423>broken<s%> when it <S%H7306>touches<s%> the <S%H784>fire.<s%> So his <S%H3581>strength<s%> was not <S%H3045>known.<s%>

<S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> <S%H2048>"Behold,<s%> you have mocked <S%H1696>me,<s%> and told me <S%H3577>lies:<s%> now please <S%H5046>tell<s%> me with which you might be <S%H631>bound.<s%>"

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H631>her,<s%> "If they only bind <S%H631>me<s%> with <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes<s%> with which no work has been <S%H4399>done,<s%> then shall I become <S%H2470>weak,<s%> and be as <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H120>man.<s%>"

So <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H2319>new<s%> <S%H5688>ropes,<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him <S%H559>therewith,<s%> and said to <S%H6430>him,<s%> "The Philistines are on <S%H8123>you,<s%> Samson!" The <S%H693>ambush<s%> was <S%H3427>waiting<s%> in the inner <S%H2315>room.<s%> He <S%H5423>broke<s%> them off his <S%H2220>arms<s%> like a <S%H2339>thread.<s%>

<S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> "Until <S%H2008>now,<s%> you have <S%H2048>mocked<s%> me and <S%H1696>told<s%> me <S%H3577>lies.<s%> <S%H5046>Tell<s%> me with what you might be <S%H631>bound.<s%>" He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H707>her,<s%> "If you weave the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of my <S%H7218>head<s%> with the <S%H4545>web.<s%>"

She <S%H8628>fastened<s%> it with the <S%H3489>pin,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6430>him,<s%> "The Philistines are on <S%H8123>you,<s%> Samson!" He <S%H3364>awakened<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> and plucked <S%H5265>away<s%> the <S%H3489>pin<s%> of the <S%H708>beam,<s%> and the <S%H4545>web.<s%>

She <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H349>him,<s%> "How can you <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H157><s%> 'I love <S%H3820>you,<s%>' when your heart is not with <S%H2048>me?<s%> You have mocked me these <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H6471>times,<s%> and have not <S%H5046>told<s%> me where your <S%H1419>great<s%> strength <S%H3581>lies.<s%>"
It <S%H6693>happened,<s%> when she pressed him <S%H3117>daily<s%> with her <S%H1697>words,<s%> and <S%H509>urged<s%> <S%H5315>him,<s%> that his soul was <S%H7114>troubled<s%> to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

He <S%H5046>told<s%> her all his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> and <S%H5046>said<s%> to <S%H4177>her,<s%> "No razor has ever <S%H5927>come<s%> on my <S%H7218>head;<s%> for I have been a <S%H5139>Nazirite<s%> to <S%H430>God<s%> from my <S%H517>mother<s%>'s <S%H990>womb.<s%> If I am <S%H1548>shaved,<s%> then my <S%H3581>strength<s%> will <S%H5493>go<s%> from <S%H2470>me,<s%> and I will become weak, and be like any other <S%H120>man.<s%>"

When <S%H1807>Delilah<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that he had <S%H5046>told<s%> her all his <S%H3820>heart,<s%> she <S%H7971>sent<s%> and <S%H7121>called<s%> for the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Come <S%H5927>up<s%> this <S%H6471>once,<s%> for he has <S%H5046>told<s%> me all his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>" Then the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H5927>her,<s%> and brought the <S%H3701>money<s%> in their <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

She made him <S%H3462>sleep<s%> on her <S%H1290>knees;<s%> and she <S%H7121>called<s%> for a <S%H376>man,<s%> and shaved <S%H1548>off<s%> the <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H4253>locks<s%> of his <S%H7218>head;<s%> and she <S%H2490>began<s%> to <S%H6031>afflict<s%> <S%H3581>him,<s%> and his strength went from <S%H5493>him.<s%>

She <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> are upon <S%H8123>you,<s%> Samson!" He <S%H3364>awoke<s%> out of his <S%H8142>sleep,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> "I will go <S%H3318>out<s%> as at other <S%H6471>times,<s%> and <S%H5287>shake<s%> myself <S%H3045>free.<s%>" But he didn't know that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had departed from <S%H5493>him.<s%>

The <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> <S%H270>laid<s%> hold on <S%H5365>him,<s%> and put out his <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> and they brought him <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> and <S%H631>bound<s%> him with fetters of <S%H5178>brass;<s%> and he <S%H2912>ground<s%> at the mill in <S%H1004>the<s%> <S%H631>prison.<s%>
However the <S%H8181>hair<s%> of his <S%H7218>head<s%> <S%H2490>began<s%> to grow <S%H6779>again<s%> <S%H834>after<s%> he was <S%H1548>shaved.<s%>

The <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> gathered them <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H2076>offer<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> to <S%H1712>Dagon<s%> their <S%H430>god,<s%> and to <S%H8057>rejoice;<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Our <S%H430>god<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> <S%H8123>Samson<s%> our <S%H341>enemy<s%> into our <S%H3027>hand.<s%>"

When the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H1984>him,<s%> they praised their <S%H430>god;<s%> for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Our <S%H430>god<s%> has <S%H5414>delivered<s%> our <S%H341>enemy<s%> and the <S%H2717>destroyer<s%> of our <S%H776>country,<s%> who has <S%H2491>slain<s%> <S%H7235>many<s%> of <S%H3027>us,<s%> into our hand."

It <S%H3820>happened,<s%> when their hearts were <S%H2896>merry,<s%> that they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H7121>"Call<s%> for <S%H8123>Samson,<s%> that he may <S%H7832>entertain<s%> <S%H7121>us.<s%>" They called for <S%H8123>Samson<s%> out of the <S%H631>prison;<s%> <S%H1004><s%> and he <S%H6711>performed<s%> before <S%H6440>them.<s%> They <S%H5975>set<s%> him between the <S%H5982>pillars;<s%>

and <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H5288>boy<s%> who <S%H2388>held<s%> him by the <S%H3027>hand,<s%> <S%H3240>"Allow<s%> me to <S%H4184>feel<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> whereupon the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3559>rests,<s%> that I may lean on <S%H8172>them.<s%>"

Now the <S%H1004>house<s%> was <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H582>men<s%> and <S%H802>women;<s%> and all the <S%H5633>lords<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> were <S%H1406>there;<s%> and there were on the roof about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men<s%> and <S%H802>women,<s%> who <S%H7200>saw<s%> while <S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7832>performed.<s%>

<S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>"Lord<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H2388>me,<s%> please, and strengthen <S%H6471>me,<s%> please, only this once, <S%H430>God,<s%> that I may be at <S%H6471>once<s%> <S%H5358>avenged<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> for my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>"

<S%H8123>Samson<s%> took <S%H3943>hold<s%> of the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H8432>middle<s%> <S%H5982>pillars<s%> on which the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H3559>rested,<s%> <S%H5564><s%> and leaned on <S%H259>them,<s%> the one with his right <S%H3225>hand,<s%> and the <S%H259>other<s%> with his <S%H8040>left.<s%>

<S%H8123>Samson<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Let me <S%H4191>die<s%> with the <S%H6430>Philistines!<s%>" He <S%H5186>bowed<s%> himself with all his <S%H3581>might;<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> on the <S%H5633>lords,<s%> and on all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were <S%H4191>therein.<s%> So the dead that he <S%H4191>killed<s%> at his <S%H4191>death<s%> were <S%H7227>more<s%> than those who he <S%H4191>killed<s%> in his <S%H2416>life.<s%>

Then his <S%H251>brothers<s%> and all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> came <S%H3381>down,<s%> and <S%H5375>took<s%> <S%H5927>him,<s%> and brought him up, and <S%H6912>buried<s%> him between <S%H6881>Zorah<s%> and <S%H847>Eshtaol<s%> in the <S%H6912>burial<s%> site of <S%H4495>Manoah<s%> his <S%H1>father.<s%> He <S%H8199>judged<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
